title: What should I invent or innovate next? - Quora

response.answer_text: Something that could be trusted upon blindly, in this unfair world.Something that could remove the poverty, and feed every starving person.Something that could provide education as a person’s freedom, and not as a business.Something that could bring smile to every crying face.Something that could wait for the slowest and unprivileged person.Something that would respect the individuality of a person.Something that could support the parents and give them that happiness of the son/daughter who had abandoned them.Something that could replace the fear of ghosts and supernatural powers with fear of today’s political imbalance and breaking brotherhood.Something that would punish the frauds instantly in this world of cybercrime.Something that would keep the nation and every people of it, and the world, a place of union, where happiness and respect for every individual is a prime concern, rather than inequalities and selfishness…Hope, we will get all these in future innovations of our bright people…

My dear friend it is totally depend on you to invent or innovate something new it depends on your passion, your skills and your mind set. You should have a ability to think creatively and find some innovative idea which provide values and solve any problem of public
